statements: SELECT * FROM episode_engagement;
SELECT episode_title, viewership_count FROM episode_engagement;
SELECT episode_title, air_date FROM episode_engagement WHERE viewership_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM episode_engagement WHERE social_media_buzz < 50;
SELECT episode_id, episode_title FROM episode_engagement ORDER BY air_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM episode_engagement WHERE viewership_count > 1000 ORDER BY air_date DESC, social_media_buzz ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT episode_title, viewership_count FROM episode_engagement WHERE air_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT episode_title, viewership_count, social_media_buzz FROM episode_engagement WHERE social_media_buzz > 5000 ORDER BY viewership_count DESC;
SELECT episode_id, episode_title, air_date FROM episode_engagement WHERE social_media_buzz < 1000 ORDER BY episode_title ASC, air_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT episode_title, air_date, viewership_count FROM episode_engagement WHERE air_date < '2022-06-30' AND social_media_buzz >= 3000 ORDER BY viewership_count DESC, episode_title DESC LIMIT 8;
SELECT * FROM episode_engagement;
SELECT episode_id, views FROM episode_engagement ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM episode_engagement WHERE comments > 50;
SELECT episode_id, likes FROM episode_engagement WHERE views < 1000;
SELECT episode_id, views, likes, comments FROM episode_engagement WHERE likes > 200 ORDER BY comments ASC;
SELECT * FROM episode_engagement WHERE episode_id = 1;
SELECT episode_id, views, likes, comments FROM episode_engagement WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY views DESC;
SELECT episode_id, likes, comments FROM episode_engagement WHERE comments > 50 AND likes < 200;
SELECT episode_id, views, likes, comments FROM episode_engagement WHERE views > 1000 OR likes > 200 ORDER BY likes DESC, comments ASC;
SELECT e.episode_id, e.views, s.hashtags, s.mentions FROM episode_engagement e JOIN social_media_buzz s ON e.episode_id = s.episode_id WHERE s.shares > 50 ORDER BY e.views DESC, s.mentions ASC;
SELECT * FROM episode_engagement;
SELECT episode_id, viewership_count FROM episode_engagement ORDER BY viewership_count DESC;
SELECT episode_id, viewership_count, social_media_buzz_count FROM episode_engagement WHERE viewership_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM social_media_comments WHERE viewer_id = 123 ORDER BY comment_id ASC;
SELECT episode_id, MAX(social_media_buzz_count) AS max_buzz_count FROM episode_engagement GROUP BY episode_id HAVING MAX(social_media_buzz_count) > 5000;
SELECT * FROM episode_engagement
SELECT episode_id, viewership_count, social_media_buzz_count FROM episode_engagement
SELECT episode_id, social_media_buzz_count, viewership_count FROM episode_engagement
SELECT episode_id, social_media_buzz_count, viewership_count FROM episode_engagement ORDER BY viewership_count DESC
SELECT episode_id, viewership_count, social_media_buzz_count FROM episode_engagement WHERE social_media_buzz_count > 100
SELECT * FROM episode_engagement;
SELECT episode_id, viewership_count, social_media_mentions FROM episode_engagement WHERE viewership_count > 10000;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender FROM viewer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT episode_id, imdb_rating, rotten_tomatoes_rating FROM episode_rating WHERE imdb_rating > 8.0;
SELECT * FROM episode_engagement;
SELECT episode_id, viewership_count, social_media_mentions FROM episode_engagement ORDER BY viewership_count DESC;
SELECT episode_id, social_media_mentions FROM episode_engagement WHERE viewership_count > 1000;
SELECT episode_id, viewership_count, social_media_mentions FROM episode_engagement JOIN episode_rating ON episode_engagement.episode_id = episode_rating.episode_id;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM viewer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM episode_viewers ORDER BY viewing_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT episode_id, MAX(user_rating) AS max_rating FROM episode_viewers GROUP BY episode_id;
SELECT episode_id, COUNT(*) AS total_viewers FROM episode_viewers GROUP BY episode_id ORDER BY total_viewers DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_social_media WHERE followers_count > 1000 AND following_count < 500;
SELECT episode_id, hashtag FROM episode_hashtags WHERE episode_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM episode_viewers ORDER BY viewing_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT episode_id, COUNT(user_id) AS total_viewers FROM episode_viewers GROUP BY episode_id ORDER BY total_viewers DESC;
SELECT e.episode_id, eh.hashtag FROM episode_hashtags eh INNER JOIN episode_viewers ev ON ev.episode_id = eh.episode_id AND ev.user_id = 1;
SELECT um.social_media_handle, um.followers_count, us.following_count FROM user_social_media um INNER JOIN user_social_media us ON um.user_id = us.user_id;

SELECT ec.comment_id, ec.comment_text, ec.comment_time, eu.user_id, eu.episode_id FROM episode_comments ec LEFT JOIN episode_viewers ev ON ec.user_id = ev.user_id LEFT JOIN episode_viewers eu ON ec.episode_id = eu.episode_id WHERE ev.viewing_time < '2022-01-01';
